title: CHAPTER I A MESSAGE FROM THE WEST

book.title: When Wilderness was King
book.description: 简介： S URELY it was no longer ago than yesterday. I had left the scythe lying at the edge of the long grass, and gone up through the rows of nodding Indian corn to the house, seeking a draught of cool water from the spring. It was hot in the July sunshine...
